title: Japan : number of internet users 2017 to 2023
yAxis: Number of internet users in millions
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of internet users in millions, with a total of 7 data points. The chart has 3 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly negative which exists from 2023 to 2021.
But, the next significant trend is slightly neutral which exists from 2021 to 2019.
But, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2019 to 2017.
gold: This statistic provides information on the number of internet users in Japan from 2017 to 2023 . In 2018 , Japan had approximately 117.6 million internet users . This figure is projected to decrease to about 117.5 million internet users in 2023 .
